remarks: A relationship between the rank function and the cumulative hierarchy of sets function ` R1 ` .  Proposition 9.15(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
statement: rankr1c $p |- ( A e. U. ( R1 " On ) -> ( B = ( rank ` A ) <-> ( -. A e. ( R1 ` B ) /\ A e. ( R1 ` suc B ) ) ) ) $.
